Class StompReactorNettyCodec

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor.AbstractNioBufferReactorNettyCodec<byte[]>
org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp.StompReactorNettyCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReactorNettyCodec<byte[]>
public class StompReactorNettyCodec extends AbstractNioBufferReactorNettyCodec<byte[]>
Simple delegation to StompDecoder and StompEncoder.

5.0
